name: A SITE: DEFENSE_01
description: Standard A Site defense for A Main.

pieces.name: Camera
pieces.description: Camera high up so it can check deep into A main to give early info.

pieces.name: Trapwires
pieces.description: First wire for attackers entering site, second for anyone positioning towards the lever.

pieces.name: Cages
pieces.description: First cage is used to peek from left side of dice, second to protect while repositioning. Instead of the oneway lineup you can use a simple cage on the ground just outside of A main entrance.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Check cameras for attackers in A Main, then peek from left side of dice with A Main oneway, when exposed use second cage reposition and adapt.

name: A SITE: DEFENSE_02
description: Split A Site defense, A Main and Tree areas.

pieces.name: Camera
pieces.description: Lower camera to check into tree, but cannot see inside A Main.

pieces.name: A Main
pieces.description: Standard wire and cage to stop pushes.

pieces.name: Tree
pieces.description: Wire and oneway to shoot from site.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Check camera to see if attackers are coming from Tree, activate oneway and shoot behind the cages, beware of A Main, if there attackers there you can use the other cage to protect yourself.

name: A SITE: TREE
description: One way from garden to Tree, plus standard A Main defense for teammates.

pieces.name: A Site
pieces.description: Standard wire and cage for A Main.

pieces.name: Garden
pieces.description: High camera can check the feet of attackers coming from catwalk cubby into tree, very hard to spot.

pieces.name: Tree
pieces.description: Wire and oneway to shoot from garden.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Check camera, when spotting legs of enemies activate oneway and shoot, standing in the platform upstairs enemies from catwalk cubby cannot see you.

name: B SITE: DEFENSE_01
description: Standard B Site defense when playing anchor, protects both B Main and Market entrances.

pieces.name: Camera
pieces.description: High camera difficult to clear, can frequently spot enemies trying to contest B Site from B Main.

pieces.name: Cages
pieces.description: Two oneways, one for B main and another for market, be cautious of the left side of the B Main entrance, as enemies can see into site. Both lineups use the same position, but the first one must be crouched!

pieces.name: Wires
pieces.description: Supporting wires for the oneways.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Check camera, for Market/B Main areas the play is kind of the same, when enemies peek the entrance just activate the oneway and shoot, if they push you the wire will catch them, but beware of enemies going into lane.

name: B SITE: DEFENSE_02
description: Deep site defense from backsite, mainly focusing on enemies pushing lane and wallbangs to boathouse. You can use another wire and/or cage in stairs to protect yourself when enemies try to counter you.

pieces.name: Camera
pieces.description: Reusing standard B Site camera.

pieces.name: Lane
pieces.description: A wire plus a cage, try to line the cage with the brick to the left of the animal's tail in the grafitti, so the edges of the tripwire remain hidden for the attacker who triggers it.

pieces.name: Alternative 1: B Main
pieces.description: This cage can be used to trick your enemies to push lane and into your traps.

pieces.name: Alternative 2: Stairs
pieces.description: An alternative cage is this lineup, when enemies push stairs to counter you, this can be accompanied with a tripwire or not, your call.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Wait into backsite until enemies walk into lane and shoot using your cage, if they wander into boathouse/lever wallbang them. If you used the alternative cage for stairs, its the same but through the other door.

name: MID: DEFENSE_01
description: Simple setup for mid, using only half of utility.

pieces.name: Camera
pieces.description: Camera hidden in pizza sign.

pieces.name: Wire and Camera
pieces.description: Tricky low wire, keep in mind that raze players can clear this with their boombot, so you can place it a bit higher between the walls, but you will need to activate it manually! Ideally the cage should be placed where the camera can activate it.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Wait in Market or CT, when spotting enemies with the camera activate camera and shoot.
